explanation: [0-0] On a wooden table, a left hand is holding three blue wires, while a right hand uses wire strippers to clamp one of the wires.
[0-2] Next, the right hand uses the wire strippers to strip the insulation off of one blue wire, followed by stripping the insulation off of all three blue wires, exposing the copper wires inside.

[2-5] Immediately afterward, the scene switches to a left hand holding three copper wires and a right hand using needle-nose pliers to bend the three copper wires.

[7-10] Subsequently, the scene shifts to the bent copper wires, and a metal ring is placed around them. The scene then cuts to the needle-nose pliers clamping the copper wires while the metal ring rotates, twisting the three copper wires together. Afterward, a hand uses a pair of yellow pliers to cut off the excess copper wire, and a green check mark appears in the frame.
